title: Transit question to ec campus
content: Does anyone go from kengeri to ec campus on nice road through buses like nice 8? I would like to know more about the bus stops and timings

comments.body: Its on a 30 min frequency and it costs 65 rupees one way(this was till tumkur road stop idk about kengri stop) it take about an hour to reach Electronic City
Bro that google maps doesn't recommend this route at all and the route it recommends takes atleast 2hours
How about bus stops? There are none on g maps
in NICE route bus stops would be limited to 2 or 3 (such as kengeri , kanakapura road , hosur road ig)
its the in an app called movit or something, but a google search would give u good results
Student pass make us charge free?
Type NICE 8 or NICE 10 on Google maps...you will get info
